ComicInfo.Summary:
As the team presses on toward Mac's hometown, they also begin to uncover more about his painful past. But with emotions running high, will the team be able to give it their all once they uncover the lurking Swarm? The Hivebusting action continues here! A new Gears of War mission from Kurtis Wiebe, the writer of the hit Rise of RAAM miniseries! With over 30 million copies sold and 50 million+ unique users, Gears of War is one of the most successful game franchises of all time.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Alan Quah (a) & Sean Lee (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Pierre Droal | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:21:32. [CVDB726077]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alan Quah, Pierre Droal, Sean Lee
ComicInfo.Editor: Chase Marotz, Anni Perheentupa, Denton J. Tipton
